pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
You’re probably working on this but I’m testing with different sensor orientations. I passed some pitch to the macro but \(1\) the sensor changed in roll and \(2\) the post also moved.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3732308212-laser_pitch.png)
I'd expect the sensor to always pivot around the edge of the side arm link. I'd also expect the post to always remain vertical. The only post movement should be on `X` and `Y`. The `Z` or `height` should only affect the side arm link \(and the sensor\).
